tafsirQuiz.question: Which concept is emphasized in Surah Al-Jumu'ah, Ayah 1?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: To send the prophets for the guidance of human beings is the expression of the same attributes of God at the level of humanity as those expressed in relation to material things at the level of the universe
distractors: This verse gives rulings on trade and commerce
This verse warns about the punishment of disbelievers
This verse promises paradise to the righteous

tafsirQuiz.question: What key concept does this verse highlight?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: The Jews did not follow the teachings of their religion, but they had made it a sign of pride for themselves. However, when death overtakes such people, they will come to know that the pride on which they were living in the world will bring them nothing but dishonour in the Hereafter
distractors: This verse warns about the punishment of disbelievers
This verse promises paradise to the righteous
This verse narrates a historical event

tafsirQuiz.question: What consequence is described in this ayah?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: In this world man is pulled in two different directions, firstly, by the force of economic considerations, and secondly, by the demands of religion. But it is essential that whatever economic success he achieves should be considered as a gift from God
distractors: This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets
This verse describes the characteristics of believers
